messages.title: OUR COUNTRY NEEDS A STRONG OPPOSITION
messages.content: Liberal Democrats are fighting hard against hard Brexit, standing up for the NHS and opposing school cuts.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tony Sutton and the Liberal Democrats will fight against hard Brexit, make a strong case for staying in the single market, ensure continued residents' rights for EU nationals in the UK, and guarantee the rights for unaccompanied child refugees.
Liberal Democrats propose a penny in the pound on income tax to secure the future of the NHS.
Local schools could face funding cuts under Conservative plans, and Liberal Democrats oppose these cuts.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet suggests that Liberal Democrats are the main challengers to the Conservatives in Nottingham South, highlighting the strategy of tactical voting.

issues.brexitEurope: Liberal Democrats are fighting hard against hard Brexit.
issues.education: Local schools could face funding cuts under Conservative plans, and Liberal Democrats oppose these cuts.
issues.health: Promotion of a penny in the pound on income tax to secure the future of the NHS.

images.caption: Tony Sutton with supporters and activists involved in various community actions.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet provides information on joining the party and mentions the Liberal Democrats' success in recent local elections.
